channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Copenhagen is adapting to a warmer world with rain tunnels and 'sponge parks'
item.description: Copenhagen is expected to receive 30% more rainfall by the end of the century. The city is responding with a massive long-term adaptation plan.

item.title: Young men swung for Trump in 2024. Democrats are working on a plan to win them back
item.description: Democrats lost serious ground with young men in the 2024 presidential election. Now, some within the party are working to win them back.

item.title: Trump administration gives personal data of immigrant Medicaid enrollees to deportation officials

item.description: Data-labeling firm Scale AI confirmed on Friday that it has received a "significant" investment from Meta that values the startup at $29 billion.

item.description: Iconiq pursued Chime because the founders were focused, and didn’t get distracted by "shiny new objects."
